item.title: Know More about Columbus Ohio
item.description: census_api_key(“37c38f3d2e15304bd682b2fb6da6dd87df896430”, install = T, overwrite = T) I just realized that I have lived in Columbus Metropolitan area for more than ten years. How time flies! In these years, I saw more and more people, buildings and vehicles. No doubt this city is growing dramatically. But I found almost all my quantitative understanding of Columbus is from Wiki…It is not bad, but what if I want to know more about this city?

item.title: Commenly-used Script
item.description: row count, column names and data types Missing Value Unique Frequency Aggregation Merge Reshape I often use R, Python, SAS, SQL, and Bash in different tasks at the same time. To make the transfer easier, here a list of the commonly-used script was built for a quick reference. At the beginning, a data set with missing and duplicated values were simulated. This data set was also saved to the feather format, which can be consumed by Python, too.

item.title: Jiang Li
item.description: I am a data modeling analyst using R/Python/SAS, a Ph.D. in physics, an enthusiastic volunteer teaching math, and a proud dad of three amazing kids. Email: jiangliemail at gmail dot com Twitter: @Jiang_Li1 LinkedIn
